description.title: Colour
description.text: In the text, VIEW shows you the determiners in blue.

description.title: Click
description.text: Click on each determiner you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

description.title: Multiple Choice
description.text: Choose a determiner from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

description.title: Fill in the Blanks
description.text: Fill in the blanks with the correct determiner. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
